mapper.select:
SELECT r.tag, r.postindex,r.category, r.language, r.default_lang, r.title, r.date, r.state, p.name, c.count FROM recommended_place r LEFT OUTER JOIN admin p ON r.admin_id = p.admin_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT postindex,COUNT(*) AS count FROM comments GROUP BY postindex)AS c ON r.postindex = c.postindex
AND (language & ${language}) != 0
AND category = '${category}'
AND state = '${state}'
AND title LIKE '%${titlename}%'
ORDER BY r.postindex DESC
LIMIT ${currentPage},${number}
SELECT category, default_lang, title, admin_id, content, tag, voice_info,address,location,date,state,phone,openday,closetime,endtime FROM recommended_place WHERE postindex= '${postindex}'
SELECT filepath FROM recommend_files WHERE fileindex= '${fileindex}'
mapper.update: UPDATE recommended_place SET category = '${category}', default_lang = '${default_lang}', title = '${title}', content = '${content}', tag = '${tag}', voice_info = '${voice_info}', location = '${location}', address = '${address}', phone = '${phone}', state = '${state}', openday = '${openday}', opentime = '${opentime}', closetime = '${closetime}', endtime = '${endtime}' WHERE postindex = '${postindex}'
UPDATE recommend_files SET filename = '${filename}', fileuuid = '${fileuuid}', filepath = '${filepath}' WHERE fileindex = '${fileindex}'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comments as r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT name,user_id FROM user) AS c ON r.id = c.user_id WHERE postindex = '${postindex}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content_translate(language, postindex, title, content, tag, voice_info, address) VALUE('${language}',${postindex},'${title}','${content}','${tag}','${voice_info}','${address}')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM content_translate WHERE postindex = '${postindex}' and language = '${language}'
mapper.update: UPDATE content_translate SET title = '${title}', content = '${content}', tag = '${tag}', voice_info = '${voice_info}', address = '${address}' WHERE postindex = ${postindex} AND language = '${language}'
